value.title: Tesla announces it’s moving away from ultrasonic sensors in favor of ‘Tesla Vision’
value.excerpt: Tesla announced today that it is moving away from using ultrasonic sensors in its suite of Autopilot sensors in favor of its camera-only “Tesla Vision” system. Last year, Tesla announced it would transition to its “Tesla Vision” Autopilot without radar and start producing vehicles without a front-facing radar.

value.title: Three Reasons Why Artificial Intelligence Wins With Specialization
value.excerpt: When I began learning about artificial intelligence (AI) and machine learning (ML), it was from the perspective of trying to help very smart people do challenging tasks. This is opposed to learning about an AI algorithm and trying to see how far I could push it for the sake of science (which has its own merits) and then searching for an application in the real world.
